page.title: 19Food Superstore.
page.content: Kaye Evans' father and Verity's mother work at what is now called the Kilgetty Co-op. Its real name is Pricefighter but they will change the name soon to Market Fresh. Mr. Phillips, the manager, said that customers come from St. Clears, Whitland, Tenby and Carew. It is in a good central position with a large car park. Sales have been maintained despite the by pass. 52 full time and part time people work there. They receive about l00 deliveries of food per week. The takings double during the summer months. People still have membership numbers and can buy shares or use their stamps to buy reduced foods. It is open late on Thursday and Friday nights. It is part of a large chain of Co-operative Societies. The turnover per year is about 3.5 million pounds.
